item.title: Geometry Genius
item.description: Geometry Genius is an application that can calculate area of different kind of geometry shape.

item.title: Tribute to Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman
item.description: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman, the founding leader of Bangladesh, led the nation to independence in 1971 and is honored as the “Father of the Nation” for his enduring legacy.

item.title: Alphabet Clash
item.description: Alphabet Clash is a fast-paced letter-finding game that challenges your speed and accuracy.

item.title: Tic Tac Toe Game
item.description: Enjoy a classic game of Tic-Tac-Toe with this interactive, JavaScript-powered online version!

item.title: JavaScript Documantation
item.description: This Technical Documentation site provides a structured guide for developers, offering essential coding concepts, examples, and explanations. It’s a valuable resource for learning and reference across various programming topics.

item.title: Transport Management System
item.description: The Transport Management System for bus ticket booking is a Java-based GUI application designed to streamline bus ticket reservations. It allows users to search for buses, book tickets, and manage bookings through an intuitive interface. Admins can manage bus schedules, view booking details, and handle user accounts. The application ensures efficient ticket management and provides a seamless experience for both passengers and administrators.

item.title: Munshi-Tour-Travel
item.description: Munshi Tour & Travel offers a seamless way to plan your next adventure, providing curated travel packages, convenient booking options, and personalized experiences. Explore beautiful destinations and make unforgettable memories with ease and comfort.
